div.p: The safety of our students and staff in Liberty Public Schools is our priority. This page is intended as a one stop shop when it comes to providing our stakeholders with information regarding the COVID-19 disease.

span.p: LPS hosted the final community engagement series, Coffee with the Community, on Thursday, April 23, 2020. This event was held in a virtual format due to the stay at home order. Superintendent Dr. Jeremy Tucker provided a State of the District, much of which centered on the Covid-19 epidemic and how it affects LPS. We will be excited to announce our Coffee with the Community schedule for 2020-2021!

div.p: As our mission states, we strive to inspire and equip all learners to discover their voice and unlimited potential. Here in the Innovation Corner, you will find a few examples of quality learning opportunities provided to our students.
